snippet.title: Another way of managing large amounts of data Une autre façon de gérer de grandes quantités de données
snippet.description:
Another way of managing large amounts of data Une autre façon de gérer de grandes quantités de données /
Jeff Hammerbacher is Vice President of Products and Chief Scientist at Cloudera, a US software company that provides solutions for managing and analysing very large data sets. His invited talk on 21 August was a good opportunity to exchange views with the CERN experts who face similar problems [...] BUL-NA-2009-329; 39/2009; 40/2009.- 2009 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 39/2009 40/2009
